Package it.polimi.ingsw.server

Class SocketServer

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.SocketServer
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class SocketServer
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
SocketServer class creates a socket that accepts connections from clients, and creates a thread containing them.
See Also:
Runnable

  • Constructor Details

    • SocketServer

      public SocketServer​(int port, Server server)
      Constructor SocketServer creates a new SocketServer instance.
      Parameters:
      port - of type int - the port on which server will listen.
      server - of type Server - the main server object.

  • Method Details

    • setActive

      public void setActive​(boolean value)
      Method setActive sets the active connection field of this SocketServer object.
      Parameters:
      value - the active connection value of the socket.

    • acceptConnections

      public void acceptConnections​(java.net.ServerSocket serverSocket)
      Method acceptConnections accepts connections from clients and create a new thread, one for each connection. Each thread lasts until client disconnection.
      Parameters:
      serverSocket - of type ServerSocket - the server socket, which accepts connections.

    • run

      public void run()
      Method run is the runnable method which instantiates a new socket on server side.
      Specified by:
      run in interface java.lang.Runnable
      See Also:
      Runnable.run()
